title: Smoky Paloma
source: Bricia Lopez, Javier Cabral - Asada: The Art of Mexican-Style Grilling
categories: Asada: The Art of Mexican-Style Grilling
ingredients: 16ounces (480 ml) grapefruit juice, preferably freshly squeezed
16ounces (480 ml) grapefruit-flavored sparkling water or grapefruit soda
1grapefruit, peeled and sliced into thin wedges, for garnish
directions: In a pitcher, combine the grapefruit juice, lime juice, simple syrup, tequila, and mezcal. Stir well to combine.
When ready to serve, rim a glass with chile-lime salt, fill with ice, and pour about 4 ounces per cup.
